entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
